author: arj
msg: The changes are so numerous it's hard to name them all. Needless to say, UserPreferences doesn't suck any more.

author: arj
msg: Split the registration code away from user preferences; the logic was getting far too complex.

author: arj
msg: Logout erases the JSP user cookie (this might not be correct, so this could regress in the future).

author: arj
msg: Many enhancements, including additional property values.

author: arj
msg: Added additional values for the status parameter: the tag can now check whether the authentication method is container v. custom, and whether cookie assertions are allowed (or not). Very handy for the registration/preferences JSPs and for leftmenu.
